leaflet.politicalParty: Plaid Cymru - The Party of Wales

messages.title: Your strong voice
messages.content: There is likely to be a hung parliament after the General Election on May 7 and no one party will be able to govern on its own. The voice of the small parties will be even more important in a situation of this kind. This is our opportunity to get the best deal for Wales. A vote for Plaid will be a vote for funding for Wales, for jobs for our young people, for health service, and a fight purpose infrastructure. The 21st century needs secure and fit for purpose infrastructure.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Libraries have been given a reprieve. We must have investment to keep them open permanently.
Many residents of Cardiff North work for the NHS. It must be protected for the people of Wales.
Plaid will support vibrant local economies full of small businesses which drive community cohesion.
Brownfield sites should be re-used for building rather than destroying our country's valuable green belt.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Creating jobs and reducing waiting times
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create 50,000 sustainable jobs by giving public contracts to local firms and aim to reduce waiting times in hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Minimum wage to the living wage
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the minimum wage to the living wage: a pay rise for 250,000 Welsh workers.
Zero business rates for 70,000 companies in Wales.
Protect jobs and services, reject deeper cuts in the public sector.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Ed Miliband, Nick Clegg

issues.economy: Support local economies and sustain jobs through public contracts to local firms.
issues.environment: Preserve the green belt by utilizing brownfield sites for construction needs instead of encroaching on green spaces.
issues.health: Protect the NHS and aim to reduce hospital waiting times.
issues.socialWelfare: Increase the minimum wage to the living wage for Welsh workers.

housing.content: Use brownfield sites for building to protect the green belt.

leaflet.personalStatement: Plaid’s voice will ensure that the voice of the people of Wales is strong in Westminster. Vote Plaid Cymru on May 7th.

endorsements.endorser: Leanne Wood, Arweinydd / Leader, Plaid Cymru – The Party of Wales
endorsements.endorsement: Mae Elin... eisoes yn gweithio'n galed dros bobl y Gogledd... Bydd hi'n eiriolwr cryf i chi yn San Steffan. Plaid Cymru is already working hard for North Wales... Elin will be a strong voice for you in Westminster.

images.caption: Image of Dr Elin Walker Jones with campaign messaging.
